EmailTemplate.name: NorthAm_Event_PCF Workshop_Seattle_Q314.Invite
EmailTemplate.subject: Get Hands-on with Cloud Foundry PaaS August 21 in Seattle
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<http://pivotal.io>
PIVOTAL LIVE EVENT!
Pivotal CF: Hands-On PaaS Workshop with James Watters
Interested in learning about “Platform as a Service” (PaaS) and how it can change the way you develop, deploy, and scale applications for the “Cloud Generation?”
Join the Pivotal engineering team for this free hands-on workshop while you network with peers and build some new skills.
Who Should Attend? This workshop is geared to application developers, enterprise architects, and anyone who wants to get hands-on experience developing an app in a PaaS environment. See the lab modules and topics <http://www.pivotal.io/cloud-platform-roadshow/seattle#cities> we'll cover.
AGENDA: 8:00 AM – 8:30AM – Registration 8:30 AM – 10:00 AM – Breakfast and Keynote Presentation from James Watters, Head of Product at Pivotal 10:00 AM – 1:00 PM – Hands-on Workshop (lunch provided)
Register <http://www.pivotal.io/cloud-platform-roadshow/seattle#cities> now for this exclusive event. The workshop is FREE; space is limited.
THURSDAY August 21, 2014 EMC Isilon Systems Headquarters 505 1st Avenue South Seattle, WA
REGISTER <http://www.pivotal.io/cloud-platform-roadshow/seattle#cities>
KEYNOTE PRESENTER James leads the product management, product marketing, business development, and solution engineering organization responsible for Pivotal's PaaS products.
<https://twitter.com/pivotal> <https://www.linkedin.com/company/3048967> <https://www.facebook.com/pivotalsoftware> <https://plus.google.com/105320112436428794490/posts> <http://www.youtube.com/gopivotal>
www.pivotal.io <http://gopivotal.com>
<http://pivotal.io> Pivotal <http://pivotal.io>, committed to open source and open standards, is a leading provider of application and data infrastructure software, agile development services, and data science consulting. Pivotal's revolutionary Enterprise PaaS product, Pivotal CF, powered by Cloud Foundry, is available now.
